name: Auto Forward Bot
description: I am a Auto Forward Bot, I can forward files from a Public/Private Channel to a Public/Private Group/Channel without SESSION STRING.

ADMINS.description: Id of Admins who have access to Bot. Multiple id use space to split

API_ID.description: API ID to configure Bot ownership, Get this value from https://my.telegram.org

API_HASH.description: API HASH to configure Bot ownership, Get this value from https://my.telegram.org

BOT_TOKEN.description: Your bot token to define on which bot app will work, Get this value from @BotFather.

TARGET_CHANNEL.description: A channel where bot will send files. channel id with -100xxxxxxx

LOG_CHANNEL.description: send all error and json file channel mean Bach file channel
